title: Contributor Code of Conduct
text: contributors maintainers project, pledge respect people contribute reporting issues, posting feature requests, updating documentation, submitting pull requests patches, activities. committed making participation project harassment-free experience everyone, regardless level experience, gender, gender identity expression, sexual orientation, disability, personal appearance, body size, race, ethnicity, age, religion. Examples unacceptable behavior participants include use sexual language imagery, derogatory comments personal attacks, trolling, public private harassment, insults, unprofessional conduct. Project maintainers right responsibility remove, edit, reject comments, commits, code, wiki edits, issues, contributions aligned Code Conduct. Project maintainers follow Code Conduct may removed project team. Instances abusive, harassing, otherwise unacceptable behavior may reported opening issue contacting one project maintainers. Code Conduct adapted Contributor Covenant (http://contributor-covenant.org), version 1.0.0, available http://contributor-covenant.org/version/1/0/0/

title: Introduction to SKYNET
text: SKYNET effectively divided four segments: Import Data Generate Air Networks Plot Air Networks

title: Introduction to SKYNET
text: import data, simply type import_db1b() import_t100() including path desired file. Note: recommend naming files similar structure Ticket 2016Q1.csv Coupon 2016Q1.csv respectively. BTS DB1B data consists 2 sets files, Coupon Ticket. can downloaded https://www.transtats.bts.gov/DL_SelectFields.asp?Table_ID=289 https://www.transtats.bts.gov/DL_SelectFields.asp?Table_ID=272 respectively. Despite possible download complete zipped file, includes variables, due size, recommend selecting following set. Since version 1.0.2 import method changed netimport() function longer available. importing prezipped DB1B file, just add argument zip = TRUE import_db1b() function. apply T100 file can simply imported typing import_t100(). order save space, possible well import prezipped file, convert smaller file necessary variables, function convert_raw(). importing files T100 dataset, recommend naming file T100 year mkt Market dataset T100 year seg Segment dataset.

title: Introduction to SKYNET
text: SKYNET creates three types networks extra option: Directed Network - make_net_dir() Undirected Network - make_net_und() Path Network - make_net_path() Metro Network - used argument make_net_dir() make_net_und() International Option - make_net_int() generating network, SKYNET, creates list includes: Dataframe original data (example ) iGraph object Dataframe nodes(airports) statistics generating network SKYNET, possible use following arguments: 1. carriers - groups OD data per carrier TRUE extract backbone network: 1. cap (used pct) - filters network based given percentage (default percentage = 10%) 1. disp (used alpha) - filters network using Serrano et backbone extraction algorithm (default alpha = 0.003)

title: Introduction to SKYNET
text: One SKYNET’s advantages possibility plotting maps without recur external software. Typing net_map(skynet_object) plots ggplot2 based map OD information. specifying group carrier option generating network, net_map() distinguishes carriers different colors. pct argument allow plot percentage available data. important point path dataframe created SKYNET.

title: Introduction to SKYNET
text: SKYNET, allows well perform quick searches airports carriers, IATA code. find_airport(), find_carrier().

title: Introduction to SKYNET
text: version 1.0.2, included option bootstrap networks retrieve certain network statistics.
code: library(skynet) test <- make_net_dir(OD_Sample) boot_network(test$gDir, n = 10) ##                            0.5%       99.5% mean_random mean_empirical ## average.path.length   2.4508909   2.4679468   2.4617623      3.4255542 ## transitivity          0.3335002   0.3488487   0.3415284      0.3302566 ## betweenness         278.5111155 283.2260159 281.6537849    377.7058371

title: Authors and Citation
text: Filipe Teixeira. Author, maintainer.

title: Authors and Citation
text: Teixeira F (2024). skynet: Generates Networks BTS Data. R package version 1.4.3, https://github.com/ropensci/skynet.
code: @Manual{,   title = {skynet: Generates Networks from BTS Data},   author = {Filipe Teixeira},   year = {2024},   note = {R package version 1.4.3},   url = {https://github.com/ropensci/skynet}, }

title: Generates Networks from BTS Data
text: rationale behind Skynet, provide researchers unifying tool overcoming challenges faced dealing Bureau Transport Statistics, DB1B T100 data. DB1B data consists 2 sets files, Coupon Ticket. can downloaded https://www.transtats.bts.gov/Fields.asp?gnoyr_VQ=FLM https://www.transtats.bts.gov/Fields.asp?gnoyr_VQ=FKF respectively T100 data can found https://www.transtats.bts.gov/Fields.asp?gnoyr_VQ=FIL.

title: Generates Networks from BTS Data
text: comply R syntax guidelines, changed clearer function naming version 1.2.0. Deprecated functions still present, removed next versions.

what: Note on importing from other data sources
title: Generates Networks from BTS Data
text: constantly working new functions allow importing data different data sources. However, can’t cover least now, case like work database covered skynet, simply create data.frame following variables: itin_id, mkt_id, seq_num, origin_mkt_id, origin, year, quarter, dest_mkt_id, dest, trip_break, op_carrier, distance, gateway, roundtrip, itin_yield, passengers, itin_fare, bulk_fare, distance_full information variables, please visit https://www.transtats.bts.gov/Fields.asp?gnoyr_VQ=FLM https://www.transtats.bts.gov/Fields.asp?gnoyr_VQ=FKF. Skynet allows variables 0 NA value, however, ’re working specific dataset doesn’t allow easy conversion format, please feel free create issue can look . Please make sure include least one small example csv file data ’re trying import.

title: Generates Networks from BTS Data
text: can install skynet github :

title: Generates Networks from BTS Data
text: import data, simply type import_db1b() import_t100() including path desired file.Note: Coupon file take first argument Ticket file take second argument. BTS DB1B data consists 2 sets files, Coupon Ticket. can downloaded https://www.transtats.bts.gov/Fields.asp?gnoyr_VQ=FLM https://www.transtats.bts.gov/Fields.asp?gnoyr_VQ=FKF respectively. Despite possible download complete zipped file, includes variables, due size, recommend selecting following set. Since version 1.0.2 import method changed netimport() function longer available. importing prezipped DB1B file, just add argument zip = TRUE import_db1b() function. apply T100 file can simply imported typing import_t100(). order save space, possible well import prezipped file, convert smaller file necessary variables, function convert_raw().

title: Generates Networks from BTS Data
text: generate directed network, please type:
code: library(skynet) # For DB1B data import_db1b("folder/Coupon_2011Q1.csv", "folder/Ticket_2011Q1.csv") make_net_dir(OD_2011Q1, disp = TRUE, alpha = 0.05)  # For T100 data import_t100("folder/T100_2011.csv") make_net_dir(T100_2011Q1, disp = TRUE, alpha = 0.05)

title: Network bootstrapping — boot_network
text: Bootstraps network returns output containing three network statistics: Average Path Length, Transitivity, Mean Betweenness.

title: Network bootstrapping — boot_network
text: g iGraph graph skynet object. n Number bootstraps run. (500 default) left_ci Confidence interval left limit. (0.005 default) right_ci Confidence interval left limit (0.995 default)

title: International Data — make.netInt
text: Imports International data complement DB1B data set. NOTE: using function, certain variables skewed T100 dataset contain data DB1B dataset contains.

title: International Data — make.netInt
code: make.netInt(x = NULL, m = NULL, Q = NULL)

title: International Data — make.netInt
text: x T-100 International Segment csv file m Data set merge Q Desired T-100 Quarter. equal 1, 2, 3 4.

title: Directed network — make_net_dir
text: Generates Directed Network iGraph gDir object, Data Frame netDir Data Frame Airport/Nodes statistics nodes.

title: Directed network — make_net_dir
code: make_net_dir(   x,   disp = FALSE,   alpha = 0.003,   cap = FALSE,   pct = 10,   carrier = FALSE,   metro = FALSE )

title: Directed network — make_net_dir
text: x Data frame disp Uses Serrano's disparity filter (https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Disparity_filter_algorithm_of_weighted_network) extract backbone network. alpha Argument disparity filter. cap Filters original data based edge weight. pct Argument cap filter. Value imput percentage. carrier Groups data per carrier OD metro Groups data metropolitan area

title: Directed network — make_net_dir
code: if (FALSE) { make_net_dir(OD_Sample)  # Apply Disparity Filter make_net_dir(OD_Sample, disp = TRUE, alpha = 0.05)  # Apply Percentage Cap make_net_dir(OD_Sample, cap = TRUE, pct = 20) }

title: Path and OD Network — make_net_path
text: Generates OD network Leg Count data frame(demand)

title: Path and OD Network — make_net_path
code: make_net_path(x, leg = FALSE, zero = FALSE, carrier = FALSE)

title: Path and OD Network — make_net_path
text: x Data frame leg Generates Leg Count Data frame, based Path taken. zero Displays percentage 0 usd tickets carrier Groups data per airline example, passengers BOS-ATL-LAX path, summed Air Carrier.

title: Path and OD Network — make_net_path
code: if (FALSE) { make_net_path(OD_Sample)  # Generate Leg Count make_net_path(OD_Sample, leg = TRUE) }

title: Trip directed network — make_net_trip
text: Generates Trip/Route based Directed Network iGraph gDir object, Data Frame netDir Data Frame Airport/Nodes statistics nodes. Returns type trip: OD = Origin/Destination pair, OT = Origin/Transfer pair, TT = Transfer/Transfer pair, TD = Transfer/Destination pair

title: Trip directed network — make_net_trip
text: x Data frame carrier Groups data per carrier OD

title: Undirected Network — make_net_und
text: Generates Undirected Network iGraph gUnd object, Data Frame netUnd Data Frame Airport/Nodes statistics nodes.

title: Undirected Network — make_net_und
code: make_net_und(   x,   disp = FALSE,   alpha = 0.003,   cap = FALSE,   pct = 10,   merge = TRUE,   carrier = FALSE,   metro = FALSE )

title: Undirected Network — make_net_und
text: x Data frame disp Uses Serrano's disparity filter (https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Disparity_filter_algorithm_of_weighted_network) extract backbone network. alpha Argument disparity filter. cap Filters original data based edge weight. pct Argument cap filter. Value imput percentage. merge set FALSE, keeps parallel edges instead collapsing summing weights. carrier Groups data per carrier OD metro Groups data metropolitan area

title: Undirected Network — make_net_und
code: if (FALSE) { make_net_und(OD_Sample)  # Apply Disparity Filter make_net_und(OD_Sample, disp = TRUE, alpha = 0.05)  # Apply Percentage Cap make_net_und(OD_Sample, cap = TRUE, pct = 20) }

title: Import Data — netImport
text: Imports data BTS/RITA/Transtats website File order matter, recommended name files using following syntax: "Coupon YearQuarter.csv", "Ticket YearQuarter.csv", "T100 Year". Note: recommend sparklyr used larger sets data.

title: Import Data — netImport
text: x First csv file imported, case DB1B database, case using T-100 database, file included. y Second csv file imported.

title: Displays a summary of a skynet object — summary.skynet
code: net <- make_net_dir(OD_Sample) #> Warning: `funs()` was deprecated in dplyr 0.8.0. #> ℹ Please use a list of either functions or lambdas: #>  #> # Simple named list: list(mean = mean, median = median) #>  #> # Auto named with `tibble::lst()`: tibble::lst(mean, median) #>  #> # Using lambdas list(~ mean(., trim = .2), ~ median(., na.rm = TRUE)) #> ℹ The deprecated feature was likely used in the skynet package. #>   Please report the issue at <https://github.com/ropensci/skynet/issues>. summary(net) #> Skynet Object:  #>  Year: 2011  #>  Quarter: 1  #>  Number of vertices/airports: 251  #>  Number of edges/routes: 2182

title: skynet 0.9.0
text: Added NEWS.md file track changes package.

title: skynet 0.9.2
text: Added tests Added Sample Data Fixed Imports Description file

title: skynet 0.9.3
text: Fixed “visible binding global variable” issue Replaced disparity filter semnet package package Small performace improvements Corrected spelling

title: skynet 0.9.4
text: Added T-100 import Corrected issue general import international option

title: skynet 0.9.7
text: Added new map function, now automatically printing different carriers different colors. Improved import functions Importing prezipped file, longer requires extra function.

title: skynet 0.9.7
text: Changed way itin_fare calculated Directed, Undirected Metro Networks. Now uses price per mile distance stops generate info.

title: skynet 0.9.9
text: netImport now imports T100 market segment files. netPath airlines renamed carrier. updated vignettes.

title: skynet 1.0
text: CRAN release: 2018-01-29 netMetro replaced argument netDir() netUnd().

title: skynet 1.0.1
text: CRAN release: 2018-04-06 Possible include carriers undirected networks. Possible filter non-scheduled flights. Ground Transport now included carrier. Metro Network can plotted. Improved way calculating airport passenger frequency. Minor bug fixes.

title: skynet 1.0.2
text: New import functions. Now separate functions import csv files DB1B T100 databases. New bootnet function bootstrap networks.

title: skynet 1.0.3
text: Minor adjustments Improved readability

title: skynet 1.0.4
text: Improved ReadMe file Fixed website Added extra comments help information

title: skynet 1.1.0
text: Changed way files imported. Now Coupon take first argument Ticket second. Minor adjustmenst help files.

title: skynet 1.2.0
text: Major function naming changes match syntax etiquette Skynet S3 class added

title: skynet 1.2.1
text: CRAN release: 2018-06-25 Year quarter added skynet object Fixed site

title: skynet 1.2.2
text: CRAN release: 2018-06-28 Removed convert_raw easier import using zip = TRUE argument select format saved .

title: skynet 1.2.3
text: Now possible import directly files BTS website download_db1b() function.

title: skynet 1.3
text: fixed bugs added download_t100 function, making finally possible import T100 DB1B datasets without navigate BTS website.

title: skynet 1.3.2
text: ’ve added possibility import -time performance data.

title: skynet 1.3.6
text: Added dplyr 1.0.0 compatibility

title: skynet 1.3.7
text: Improved test time

title: skynet 1.3.9
text: CRAN release: 2020-09-30 Fixed links Added download failed message

title: skynet 1.4.1
text: Fixed issue download_t100 requires query encoded.

title: skynet 1.4.2
text: CRAN release: 2022-06-02 Skips test download_t100 BTS transitioning new download methodology.

title: skynet 1.4.3
text: CRAN release: 2022-06-17 Brings back download_t100.
